uniform.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc
uniform.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He was still wearing his school uniform.
uniform.translation[1].definitions[0].de: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
uniform.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
